publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2177 Michael Matheson: Scotland’s Commonwealth Youth Games Team—That the Parliament congratulates the athletes and officials representing Scotland at the recent Commonwealth Youth Games in Bendigo, Australia; notes the success of the Scottish team, winning a total of 52 medals, including 12 gold medals, and hopes that each of the athletes can pursue their chosen sport with further international success in the future.
S2M-2177 Scotland's Commonwealth Youth Games Team (lodged on 15 December 2004) Stewart Stevenson*, Alex Neil*

S2M-2177 Michael Matheson: Scotland’s Commonwealth Youth Games Team—That the Parliament congratulates the athletes and officials representing Scotland at the recent Commonwealth Youth Games in Bendigo, Australia; notes the success of the Scottish team, winning a total of 52 medals, including 12 gold medals, and hopes that each of the athletes can pursue their chosen sport with further international success in the future. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Alex Neil, Fergus Ewing*, Jim Mather*, Shona Robison*, Margaret Jamieson*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mike Pringle*, Murdo Fraser*, Chris Ballance*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Margaret Smith*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Brian Adam*, John Swinburne*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*

S2M-2177 Scotland’s Commonwealth Youth Games Team (lodged on 15 December 2004) Jackie Baillie*, Cathie Craigie*, Phil Gallie*, Bruce Crawford*, Christine Grahame*, Robin Harper*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr John Swinney*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Shiona Baird*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-2177 Scotland’s Commonwealth Youth Games Team (lodged on 15 December 2004) Eleanor Scott*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Dennis Canavan*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-2177 Scotland’s Commonwealth Youth Games Team (lodged on 15 December 2004) Roseanna Cunningham*, John Scott*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2177 Scotland’s Commonwealth Youth Games Team (lodged on 15 December 2004) Iain Smith*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2177 Scotland’s Commonwealth Youth Games Team (lodged on 15 December 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2177 Scotland’s Commonwealth Youth Games Team (lodged on 15 December 2004) Bill Butler*
S2M-2177 Scotland’s Commonwealth Youth Games Team (lodged on 15 December 2004) Elaine Smith*
S2M-2177 Scotland’s Commonwealth Youth Games Team (lodged on 15 December 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
